action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email client with a new email open. The email is from Fujitsu and is about rescheduling a meeting. The user is requesting to move the meeting one hour later, from 2024-11-17 16:00~17:00 to 17:00~18:00.
action.program_description: Email client displaying a new email.
action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the "+" button, likely to create a new email or perform another action.
